channel.title: Bluurs New Client - Help Me
channel.description:
Hey there everyone, I have Bluur's new client. But i seem to have a little problem. When i login it it just logs me straight back out something about a lost packet 2 ? If anyone can help fix this problem then they can have a copy of the client themselves. Its fully open source.
Thanks, Elux

item.title: Bluurs New Client - Help Me
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

[quote=“Elux, post:1, topic:248591”]Hey there everyone, I have Bluur’s new client. But i seem to have a little problem. When i login it it just logs me straight back out something about a lost packet 2 ? If anyone can help fix this problem then they can have a copy of the client themselves.
Its fully open source.

Thanks,
Elux[/quote]

You have to have done the server side tutorial for this, which Bluurr made, and then deleted :/.

Read full topic
